info.name: Staff Management System API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Staff Management System with Enhanced Access Control - System Admin Only Center Management, Bulk Announcements, Restricted User Access, Multi-Center Support, Persian Date Support, Complete Employee Management

ðŸ“… **Persian Date Support**: All dates in the system are automatically converted to Persian (Jalali) format in the admin panel and API responses.

ðŸ” **Access Control**:
- System Admin: Full access to all features
- Food Admin: Can manage meals and menus for any center, cannot manage centers
- HR Admin: Can manage announcements for any center, can create bulk announcements, cannot manage centers
- Employee: Can only see and manage data for their assigned center

ðŸ“Š **Features**:
- Multi-center support
- Guest reservations
- Bulk announcements
- Persian date display
- Role-based access control
- Complete employee workflow management
- Personal and guest reservation management
- Menu viewing and reservation system
- Comprehensive API documentation

exec: console.log('Logged in as System Admin - Can manage all centers, only one who can create/update/delete centers');
console.log('Logged in as Food Admin - Can manage food for any center, cannot manage centers');
console.log('Logged in as HR Admin - Can manage announcements for any center, can create bulk announcements, cannot manage centers');
console.log('Logged in as Employee - Can only see own center data, cannot see centers list, cannot create announcements');

item.name: Employee User
item.description: Complete employee management endpoints for food reservations, guest reservations, and daily menu management

request.description: Get daily menus for employee's center on specific date
Get all personal reservations for the authenticated user

item.name: Get My Personal Reservations - Filter by Date

request.description: Get personal reservations filtered by specific date

item.name: Get My Personal Reservations - Filter by Status

request.description: Get personal reservations filtered by status (reserved, cancelled, served)
Get all guest reservations made by the authenticated user

item.name: Get My Guest Reservations - Filter by Date

request.description: Get guest reservations filtered by specific date

item.name: Get My Guest Reservations - Filter by Status

request.description: Get guest reservations filtered by status (reserved, cancelled, served)
Get summary statistics of all user reservations (personal + guest)
Login as regular employee to test complete workflow

exec: console.log('Logged in as Employee - Ready for complete workflow');
